tool_description: Converts audio tracks between different file formats, sample rates, bit depths, and channel configurations while maintaining quality.

output_format.description: Target format (wav, mp3, flac, aiff, ogg, m4a)

target_bit_depth.description: Target bit depth (16, 24, 32) - ignored for lossy formats

quality_level.description: Encoding quality for lossy formats (0.1 to 1.0)

error_messages: Invalid track ID: The specified track_id does not exist.
Unsupported format: Use one of [wav, mp3, flac, aiff, ogg, m4a].
Invalid sample rate: Use one of [22050, 44100, 48000, 96000, 192000] Hz.
Invalid bit depth: Use one of [16, 24, 32] bits.
Invalid quality level: quality_level must be between 0.1 and 1.0.
Invalid channel mode: Use one of [preserve, mono, stereo].
Conversion failed: Unable to convert audio to the specified format.
usage: Specify track_id and output_format. Optionally set target_sample_rate, target_bit_depth, quality_level, and channel_mode for format-specific options.

converted_track_id.description: Track ID of the converted audio

output_file_path.description: File path of the converted audio file

file_size_bytes.description: Size of the converted file in bytes
